plot: On the coast of North America in AD 1007, two Norsemen are stranded when their expedition is attacked and they are left for dead. As they struggle to survive in the vast forests of the New World, their paths diverge as one pursues a spiritual quest and the other reverts to his primal instincts
title: Severed Ways: The Norse Discovery of America
plot_es: On the coast of North America in AD 1007, two Norsemen are stranded when their expedition is attacked and they are left for dead.
